mapper.select: SELECT point FROM MEMBER WHERE ME_NO = #{meNo}
SELECT pc_no, me_no, point, pc_time AS insertTime FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE me_no = #{meNo} AND point > 0 ORDER BY pc_time DESC
SELECT req_no AS meNo, pay_amount AS point, paid_time AS insertTime FROM REQUEST WHERE client_no = #{meNo} AND pay_status = 'Y' ORDER BY paid_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET point = #{point} WHERE me_no = #{meNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT_HISTORY (me_no, point, pc_time) VALUES (#{meNo}, -#{point}, SYSDATE)
